title: The Making of 'Silent Running'
creator_credit: Chuck Barbee, Thomas Piskura and Chuck Barbee Productions
brief_description: Presents a behind-the-scenes look at the people and technology needed to produce the film “Silent running”. Gives a close look at the work of director Douglas Trumbull, star Bruce Dern, singer Joan Baez, the editor, cameraman and others. Suitable for upper secondary level.
